body.name: LG UQ7590 86-Inch Class UHD Smart TV 86UQ7590PUD, 2022 - AI-Powered 4K, Alexa Built-In, Grey
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Engineered especially for LG, this UHD TV features the advanced α7 Gen5 AI Processor 4K adapts and adjusts picture and sound quality for a lifelike viewing experience with depth and rich color
Get in the action with an impressive 120Hz refresh rate that keeps up with the fast movement in sports, video games, and movies for a sharp, colorful picture with smooth motion from start to finish

Find your favorite shows and movies with built-in access to Netflix, Prime Video, Apple TV app, Disney+, HBO Max* and instant access to over 300+ free LG Channels** with everything from comedy to movies to sports
Customize your viewing experience for you and your family with separate accounts and personalized recommendations. Adjust all of your game settings in one place with Game Optimizer
Mount it on the wall with a 600 x 400 VESA mount (sold separately). Standard remote (not Magic Remote), remote control batteries (AA) , power cable, and quick start guide are included
body.description: Everything you need to bring your favorite content to life with the power of 4K and the extras you crave. Additional gaming options include two HDMI 2.1 ports for modern consoles with FreeSync Premium and Variable Refresh Rate (VRR) for a fluid, tear-free image during gameplay. Add a sound bar (sold separately) with support for Enhanced Audio Return Channel (eARC) HDMI. Integrate this UHD TV into your smart home with support for Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, Apple AirPlay2, and HomeKit (separate device may be necessary).*Internet connection and subscription to streaming services are required. Amazon, Prime Video and all related logos are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. Amazon Prime membership and/or Prime Video fees apply. See primevideo.com/terms for details. HBO Max 2022 Warner Media, LLC. All Rights Reserved. HBO Max is used under license. **Number of LG Channels subject to change.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra-Large Screen Large and In Charge Experience your favorite content up-close with an ultra-large 4K UHD TV.

Previous page Real 4K UHD TV Taking in the Views Everything you need to bring your favorite content to life with the power of 4K. Design A Perfect Fit LG UHD TVs are designed slim and sleek with a minimal bezel so they’ll match your space perfectly. α7 Gen 5 AI Processor 4K Seeing It Is Believing It Experience a lifelike picture with depth and rich colors thanks to the α7 Gen5 AI Processor 4K. 4K Upscaling Be Prepared to Be Impressed Transform regular content into 4K for sharper definition and detail, even on our biggest screens. Next page 1 Real 4K UHD TV 2 Design 3 α7 Gen 5 AI Processor 4K 4 4K Upscaling

Previous page AI Brightness Control Ready Morning, Noon or Night AI Brightness Control that automatically adjusts your screen to match the room. AI Sound See It. Hear It. Feel It. The α7 Gen 5 AI Processor automatically up-mixes 2-channel audio into virtual 5.1 channel sound. Smart Assistant Ready to Assist Use your voice to control your TV and connected devices with built-in support. Sports Alert Real Time & Really Impressive Never miss a moment with real-time updates from your favorite teams and most important matches. Next page 1 AI Brightness Control 2 AI Sound 3 Smart Assistant 4 Sports Alert

Previous page Active HDR (HDR10 Pro) Elevate Your Scene Enjoy scene-by-scene picture adjustment to automatically adjust the quality of what you’re watching. FILMMAKER MODE Just the Way They Intended FILMMAKER MODE* automatically preserves the director's original colors, settings and frame rates. Ultimate Streaming Binge-Worthy Streaming Starts Here Find your faves with built-in access to streaming networks and access to 300+ free LG Channels. Next page 1 Active HDR (HDR10 Pro) 2 FILMMAKER MODE 3 Ultimate Streaming

Previous page AMD FreeSync Premium Take Gaming to the Next Level Enjoy fast-paced gameplay with minimal tearing, stuttering and input lag. Game Optimizer Dashboard Up Your Game Make it the best gaming experience by quickly adjusting all your game settings in one location. HGiG For the Love of Gaming LG supports HGiG guidelines, bringing you the latest HDR games with utmost realism and immersion. Next page 1 AMD FreeSync Premium 2 Game Optimizer Dashboard 3 HGiG

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beginning to present A+
reviews.reviewText: The delivery on this was excellent. The delivery guys took so much care in taking it off the truck, bringing in and removing out of the box. The television, OMG, the sound is awesome, the picture is fantastic. I’m still exploring the features but what I have experienced is great. I had a 75”Hisense that went without no warning in two years. So with disappointment I decided to upgrade to a larger size and a LG. The remote has numbers. My other television didn’t. But loving this LG right now. The delivery guy said it was a good television. I bought a three protection plan just in case. LG 86” yes and yes two thumbs up 👍👍.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Tv on that Price👍👍👍
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and best experience on 996$.Size is fantastic.Game ant tv show looking good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Came in Damage
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t like that the screen of the tv came in damage :/

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny! Clear screen! No light bleeding through screen or dark spots !
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. At the time of purchaseing this tv there was only 1 review, and at a lower price, but after extensive research and owning the slightly smaller 75in version of this LG smart tv that I've been completely satisfied with and is only a yesr old. I decided this 86in would fit my needs then would use the 75in in another room in the house.. Let's start from delivery to unboxing then set up where flawless, can't believe the negative reviews or being damaged apon deliverey. I personally can't say anything bad about this tv its packed with features and a good detailed clear picture just go into settings and fine tune the picture settings ect. And you won't be disappointed.. also when watching the LG channels the movies are super clear and detailed just as expected... oh yeah did I mention football games look great too just make sure the settings for sports are tailored to your liking. Like smooth motion mode works great for sports.. just make sure you have good cables when connecting this tv so you get the most from it.. I currently have good HDMI cables and running FIBER OPTIC from the tv through my klipsch home theater system. Even Bluetooth/ wifi work with no problems.. bottom line don't cheap out when hooking your tv up... Updated with a short video showing just how good the picture is! Go steelers 😃 Update a month after having time to enjoy this tv its better than expected! At the time of the first review there where only1 review now there's 26, alot of broken apon deliverey and others having issues.. so far no issues here and can't stress how good this tv is really is ! It's a shame there are so many broken or unhappy people out there! When buying anything on Amazon i always check out the reviews before I decide on purchasing, but when it comes to this monster of a tv trust the positive reviews! It definitely has a stunning 4k quality picture like I said in the beginning use quality cables or fiber optics.. FYI: having only an antenna when watching your local stations actually Brodcast clear as streaming movies through wifi or Bluetooth!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV, I have two with no issues
reviews.reviewText: Can’t complain about the price with the size & clarity of this television. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Buyer Beware, No ESPN+ onboard Capability
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this TV to be a mobile sports screen for parties. Unfortunately, they don’t have an app for ESPN! I wanted everything onboard for simplification. Looks like I have to add a Firestick or AppleTV. Not a huge problem, so 4 Stars. Also, it overheats FAST if in sunlight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 86 inch LG TV
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this television it’s amazing how clear the picture is and very affordable for an 86 inch television

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for Christmas, it is amazing. There are so many features that I haven't figured out yet. But the picture is great. Happy with my purchase.
